channel.title: 317 G.E. Project
channel.description:
[b]Hello, I am Alpha 0nx. I am currently thinking of starting a major coding project. We would create a complete Grand Exchange on a 317 deob. This would be the first time ever that a G.E. was ever incorporated into a 317 server.[/b]
[size=14pt][u]The project would consist of 2 smaller projects.[/u]
1) The first half would be to code a "command" G.E. This would be accessed by doing a simple command, such as: "::ge". This half of the project would also include coding the interfaces and adding roughly 250 items with prices.
2) The second half will be to code the actual G.E. landscape and global objects. This half of the project will not start until the first half is 100% complete.[/size]
To do this project, we need coders with several years of experience with the coding of servers (Preferably 317 [deob]).
To contact me, please use one of the following:
[ul][li]Email - Dakuhn17@yahoo.com[/li] [li]PM me via Moparscape[/li] [li]Chat with me on my server (use 1 or 2 to find out the ip)[/li][/ul]
[b][u]USE THE APPLICATION BELOW PLEASE!!![/u][/b]
NAME ~ AGE ~ EMAIL ~ CODING EXPERIENCE ~ PLEASE SELECT YOUR CODING TYPE ~~~ Server Side Client Side
Please ask questions if you have any. -Alpha 0nx

@alpha_0nx wrote:

Hello, I am Alpha 0nx. I am currently thinking of starting a major coding project. We would create a complete Grand Exchange on a 317 deob. This would be the first time ever that a G.E. was ever incorporated into a 317 server.

[size=14pt]The project would consist of 2 smaller projects.

  1. The first half would be to code a "command" G.E. This would be accessed by doing a simple command, such as: "::ge". This half of the project would also include coding the interfaces and adding roughly 250 items with prices. 

  2. The second half will be to code the actual G.E. landscape and global objects. This half of the project will not start until the first half is 100% complete.[/size]

To do this project, we need coders with several years of experience with the coding of servers (Preferably 317 [deob]).

To contact me, please use one of the following:

[ul][li]Email - Dakuhn17@yahoo.com[/li]
[li]PM me via Moparscape[/li]
[li]Chat with me on my server (use 1 or 2 to find out the ip)[/li][/ul]
